refnamediv.refpurpose: Select subset of array along a plane

refsect1.title: Summary
refsect1.para: The slice operator takes a sample of cells along a specified plane of an array. The result is a slice of the input array corresponding to the given coordinate value(s). Number of dimensions of the result array is equal to the number of dimensions of input array minus number of specified dimension, and the coordinate value should be a valid dimension value of the input array.

informalexample.para: This example selects the middle column from a 3×3 array.

step.para: Create a 3×3 array m3x3:CREATE ARRAY m3x3<val:double>[i=0:2,3,0,j=0:2,3,0];
Select the middle column of m3x3:slice(m3x3,j,1);This query outputs:[(1),(4),(7)]
